visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color for the axis labels and titles, with a font size of 14px for labels and 16px for titles, Data series: Provide data for a single series named 'Temperature' with monthly average temperatures for a year, Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series, Additional configurations: Set chart margins to 50px on all sides, add a light gray background to the chart, and include a legend with a black border.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, while the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius. Both axes' labels and titles are styled with a dark blue color and specific font sizes. The data series includes monthly average temperatures for a year, with the series named 'Temperature'. The series color is a gradient from light blue to dark blue. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins to 50px on all sides and adding a legend with a black border.
